title: Textile (wallcovering, U.S. Capitol), 1949
dimensions:
A. Warp: 329.5cm (12ft.10in.). Weft(selv-selv): 131cm (51in.) 
B. Warp: 196.5cm (6ft. 5in.). Weft(selv-selv): 131cm (51in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever
description: Liberty Bell and Phrygian cap with stars and curving vine. A. in gold ( Senate version ). B. in Blue and white ( House of Representatives version ).
